channel.title: Some Useless but useful stuff
channel.description:
Hello,
Well seeming as RSCE is bragging about there server beening all sql AMG?!!? i thought i would take a chance to say what? its simple anyway so i changed it all from the xml to SQL and in the middle of writing a script engine.
E.g
here is ID 31 Item Name Book Layout: ID, Name, Description, Command, Stackable, Price, Wieldable, CommandExecute [code]('30', 'Book', '', 'Read', 'false', '1', 'false', 'SendMessage("Just A Test")'),[/code]
Now the CommandExecute is read on action beening performed on the item.
Commands what are allowed to be executed via the sql so far
[ul][li]Send Message[/li] [li]Delete Item[/li] [li]AddItem[/li] [li]Teleport[/li] [li]Logout[/li][/ul]
Now i got bored i decied to go get a life
P.s Item.sql http://75.127.119.209/items.sql Object.sql http://75.127.119.209/Objects.sql

Too bad his “speed test” isn’t valid since he did it only once.

Read full topic

item.title: Some Useless but useful stuff
item.dc:creator: @darscape darscape
item.description:
@darscape wrote:

So he is Turkish?

The loading may be 365ms quicker using SQL but it can take 5 minutes to start a server for all I care, what matters is the overhead and the time it takes to save players while in game.

Read full topic

item.title: Some Useless but useful stuff
item.dc:creator: @uberpk3r uberpk3r
item.description:
@uberpk3r wrote:

[quote=“Hmm kk xD, post:4, topic:321680”][quote author=Kryptix link=topic=418126.msg3073319#msg3073319 date=1261663893]

Useless showing how people can do it so easy if they tryed, you sir are a moron you do not no the first thing about doing any of this. like ive done it to prove a point… and that point has been proven

I never said it was difficult or hard in the slightest. It took us just over a hour. I don’t get why you presume all the time? I posted it because it’s never been done before and everyone was saying stuff like “Oh it’ll take 20 seconds to load!” which simply isn’t true (as you now know, even though you said it took 20 seconds in the above post).
[/quote]Yours poorly writen the code as i’ve seen it. plus dude if you want to start ill surely post and lol at how urs admited to do the mutli threading system. and AMG DUDE EVERYTHING IS NO THREADED WE NOW RUN ON 9 THREADS! hah moron. mayb i sould run a little test for u

XML

Loaded: Doors 214 Loaded: Game Objects 1189 Loaded: NPCs 798 Loaded: Prayers 14 Loaded: Items 1329 Loaded: Spells 48 done 1095 ms.

SQL

Loaded: Doors 214 Loaded: Game Objects 1189 Loaded: NPCs 798 Loaded: Prayers 14 Loaded: Items 1329 Loaded: Spells 48 done 730 ms.
[center] T x is banned from mscp.[/center][/quote]

Many people are bannad and still allowed to make new account sorry ro say its power abjuse, ban all or don’t ban at all.

Read full topic

item.title: Some Useless but useful stuff

item.description:
@Hmm_kk_xD wrote:

Hello,

Well seeming as RSCE is bragging about there server beening all sql AMG?!!? i thought i would take a chance to say what? its simple anyway so i changed it all from the xml to SQL and in the middle of writing a script engine.

E.g

here is ID 31 Item Name Book
Layout: ID, Name, Description, Command, Stackable, Price, Wieldable, CommandExecute

('30', 'Book', '', 'Read', 'false', '1', 'false', 'SendMessage("Just A Test")'),

Now the CommandExecute is read on action beening performed on the item.

Commands what are allowed to be executed via the sql so far

[ul][li]Send Message[/li]
[li]Delete Item[/li]
[li]AddItem[/li]
[li]Teleport[/li]
[li]Logout[/li][/ul]

Now i got bored i decied to go get a life
